tldr: Captain South provides an account of the number of people in the counties of Ardmagh, Lowth, Meath, and the city of Dublin in the Kingdom of Ireland as of January 10, 1695/6. He also estimates the total population of Ireland based on the first quarter's assessment of the poll tax. This information was communicated to the Royal Society.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Demography
